mainText:
Steve has been an inspiration to so many who he never knew.  We all  
loved him,  his creative mind and how he made life so easy for us with  
his products.  My son worked for Apple, and based on his training  
(help the customer to buy what they need and not what they think they  
want),  says volumes for the integrity of the company.  My family is  
sadden by this loss and for his family and those who were close to  
him.  We will pray for all of you.
author: An Apple Family
